alert.note: Alert for Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 1:40AM CDT until July 23 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Red Lake County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... Eastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Northeastern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 139 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Dakota Junction to near Mentor to near Twin Valley, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Thief River Falls, Mentor and Terrebonne around 140 AM CDT. Erskine and Brooks around 145 AM CDT. Faith, McIntosh and Oklee around 150 AM CDT. Mavie around 155 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Goodridge, Waubun and Trail. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake
